timeline.message:
NMS-12915: Add support for gNMI

By default mode would be gnmi
NMS-12915: Add support for different sampling rates for different paths
NMS-12915: Add support for different sampling rates for different paths

timeline.bodyText:
Looks like the whole block just interpolates all keys regardless of the group.
Maybe something like this does the job:
List<Map<String, String>> interpolatedMapList = packageConfig.getParameters().stream()
    .map(parmeterMap -> getInterpolated(parmeterMap, serviceRef))
    .collect(Collectors.toList());
timeline.author: fooker

replies.bodyText: This is to put parameters that belong to one group into one set of params. Modified this and added test case to show how grouping is done.
replies.author: cgorantla

timeline.bodyText: I think it would be better to enforce en empty group on the global parameters. (And maybe print an error log message if they are specified with a group)
timeline.author: fooker

replies.bodyText: At this point, Client doesn't have any group info. It has a set of parameters.
replies.author: cgorantla
